member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Abstractions.IAssetProcessor
member.summary: Processes extracted assets into engine-specific format. Implementations: StrideBatchCompiler, GodotAssetProcessor, RawAssetProcessor (pass-through).

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Abstractions.IAssetProcessor.OutputContentTypes
member.summary: Content types this processor outputs (e.g., "application/x-stride-model"). Empty for pass-through processors that preserve original types.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Abstractions.IAssetProcessor.TypeInferencer
member.summary: Gets the type inferencer appropriate for this processor's assets. May return null if the processor has no specific type inference needs.
Processes extracted assets into engine-ready format.
member.returns: Dictionary of asset ID to processed result.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Abstractions.ProcessorOptions.FailFast
member.summary: Whether to fail on first error or continue processing.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Abstractions.IAssetSource
member.summary: Represents a source of raw assets that can be extracted for bundling. Examples: a Synty pack ZIP, a directory of FBX files, a Unity asset export.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Abstractions.IAssetSource.ContentHash
member.summary: Content hash for change detection (SHA256 of source file/directory).

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Abstractions.IAssetSource.Tags
member.summary: Tags for categorization and smart bundling.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Abstractions.IAssetSource.ExtractAsync(System.IO.DirectoryInfo,BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Abstractions.IAssetTypeInferencer,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Extracts raw assets from this source to a working directory.
member.param: Optional type inferencer for asset classification.
member.returns: Extraction result with list of extracted assets.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Abstractions.IAssetSourceProvider
member.summary: Discovers and creates asset sources from a root location. Vendor-specific implementations (e.g., SyntyPackSourceProvider) scan for their expected directory/file patterns.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Abstractions.IAssetSourceProvider.TypeInferencer
member.summary: Gets the type inferencer appropriate for this provider's assets.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Abstractions.IAssetSourceProvider.DiscoverSourcesAsync(System.IO.DirectoryInfo,BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Abstractions.DiscoveryOptions,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Discovers all asset sources in the given root directory.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Abstractions.DiscoveryOptions.SourceIdFilter
member.summary: Filter to specific source IDs (null = all).

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Abstractions.DiscoveryOptions.IncludeUnchanged
member.summary: Include sources that appear unchanged since last processing.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Abstractions.IAssetTypeInferencer
member.summary: Infers asset types and texture types from filenames and content. Vendor-specific implementations handle naming conventions (e.g., Synty uses "_normal", "_nml" for normal maps).

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Abstractions.IAssetTypeInferencer.InferAssetType(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Infers the general asset type from a filename.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Abstractions.IAssetTypeInferencer.InferTextureType(System.String)
member.summary: For texture assets, infers the specific texture type.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Abstractions.IAssetTypeInferencer.ShouldExtract(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Determines if a file should be extracted based on its path. Allows filtering out engine-specific files (Unity, Unreal, Maya, etc.).
member.param: The relative path within the source.
member.returns: True if the file should be extracted.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Abstractions.IProcessedAsset
member.summary: Result of processing a single asset through an IAssetProcessor.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Abstractions.IProcessedAsset.ContentType
member.summary: MIME content type of processed output.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Abstractions.IProcessedAsset.Dependencies
member.summary: Additional dependencies generated during processing. Key: dependency ID, Value: dependency data. Example: Stride generates buffer files alongside models.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Abstractions.IProcessedAsset.Metadata
member.summary: Processor-specific metadata (e.g., Stride GUID, Unity asset path).

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Extraction.ExtractedAsset
member.summary: Represents a single asset extracted from a source.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Extraction.ExtractedAsset.AssetId
member.summary: Unique asset identifier within the source.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Extraction.ExtractedAsset.FilePath
member.summary: Full path to the extracted file.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Extraction.ExtractedAsset.ContentType
member.summary: MIME content type (may be null if unknown).

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Extraction.ExtractedAsset.TextureType
member.summary: Texture type hint (only relevant for texture assets).

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Extraction.ExtractionResult
member.summary: Result of extracting assets from a source.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Extraction.ExtractionResult.SkippedCount
member.summary: Number of files skipped during extraction.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Extraction.TextureType
member.summary: Specific texture type hints for processing.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Metabundles.MetabundleClient
member.summary: Client for requesting server-side metabundle creation. Use when combining already-uploaded bundles on the server.

member.summary: Creates a new metabundle client from uploader (shares connection).

member.summary: Requests the server create a metabundle from existing bundles.

member.summary: Parses a realm string to the Realm enum.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Metabundles.MetabundleRequest.Realm
member.summary: Target realm for the metabundle (omega, arcadia, fantasia, shared).

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Metabundles.CreateMetabundleResult.AssetCount
member.summary: Number of assets in the metabundle.

member.summary: Adds a source bundle to include.

member.summary: Adds a standalone asset to include.

member.summary: Sets an asset filter to include only specific assets.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Pipeline.BundlerOptions.WorkingDirectory
member.summary: Working directory for extraction and processing.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Pipeline.BundlerOptions.ForceRebuild
member.summary: Force rebuild even if source unchanged.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Pipeline.BundlerOptions.MaxParallelSources
member.summary: Maximum sources to process in parallel.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Pipeline.BundlerOptions.ProcessorOptions
member.summary: Options passed to the asset processor.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Pipeline.BundleResult
member.summary: Result of bundling a single source.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Pipeline.BundleResult.BundlePath
member.summary: Path to the generated bundle (if successful).

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Pipeline.BundleResult.AssetCount
member.summary: Number of assets in the bundle.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Pipeline.BundleResult.UploadedBundleId
member.summary: Bundle ID assigned by server after upload (if applicable).

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Pipeline.BundleResult.Empty(System.String)
member.summary: Creates an empty result (no assets extracted).

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Pipeline.BundlerPipeline
member.summary: Orchestrates the complete bundling pipeline: Source → Extract → Process → Bundle → Upload
Executes the complete bundling pipeline for a single source.
member.param: Uploader for Bannou service (null = local only).
member.returns: Bundle result with path and upload status.

member.summary: Executes the pipeline for multiple sources with parallel processing.
member.param: Uploader for Bannou service (null = local only).

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Processing.RawAssetProcessor
member.summary: Pass-through processor that packages assets as-is without transformation. Use for audio files, pre-converted content, behavior definitions, etc.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Sources.DefaultTypeInferencer
member.summary: Default type inferencer with configurable file extension and pattern matching. Provides sensible defaults while allowing customization for vendor-specific conventions.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Sources.DefaultTypeInferencer.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new DefaultTypeInferencer with default configuration.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Sources.DefaultTypeInferencer.Clone
member.summary: Creates a copy of this inferencer that can be customized.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Sources.DefaultTypeInferencer.ExcludeExtension(System.String)
member.summary: Adds an extension to exclude from extraction.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Sources.DefaultTypeInferencer.ExcludeDirectory(System.String)
member.summary: Adds a directory name to exclude from extraction. Files in paths containing this directory name will be excluded.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Sources.DefaultTypeInferencer.RegisterCategoryFilter(System.String,System.Func{System.String,System.Boolean})
member.summary: Registers a category-specific extraction filter. When a category is specified, this filter is applied in addition to default rules.
member.param: Filter function that returns true if the path should be extracted.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Sources.DefaultTypeInferencer.ContainsDirectoryPattern(System.String,System.String[])
member.summary: Checks if the path contains any of the specified directory patterns.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Sources.DefaultTypeInferencer.HasSuffix(System.String,System.String[])
member.summary: Checks if the filename ends with any of the specified suffixes (before extension).

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Sources.DefaultTypeInferencer.HasPrefix(System.String,System.String[])
member.summary: Checks if the filename starts with any of the specified prefixes.

member.summary: Asset source that reads from a directory of files.

member.summary: Creates a new directory asset source.

member.summary: Asset source that reads from a ZIP archive.

member.summary: Creates a new ZIP archive asset source.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.State.BundlerStateManager
member.summary: Manages bundler state for incremental builds. Tracks which sources have been processed and their content hashes.

member.summary: Checks if a source needs processing based on content hash.
member.returns: True if the source needs processing.

member.summary: Records that a source has been successfully processed.

member.summary: Gets the processing record for a source, if it exists.
member.returns: The record, or null if not found.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.State.BundlerStateManager.RemoveRecord(System.String)
member.returns: True if the record was removed.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.State.BundlerStateManager.ComputeHash(System.IO.FileInfo)
member.summary: Computes SHA256 hash of a file for change detection.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.State.BundlerStateManager.ComputeDirectoryHash(System.IO.DirectoryInfo)
member.summary: Computes SHA256 hash of a directory (based on file contents and paths).

member.summary: Record of a successfully processed source.

member.summary: Content hash at time of processing.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.State.SourceProcessingRecord.Version
member.summary: Source version at time of processing.

member.summary: Path to the generated bundle file.

member.summary: Number of assets in the bundle.

member.summary: When the bundle was uploaded (if applicable).

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Upload.BannouUploader
member.summary: Uploads bundles to Bannou Asset Service. Supports single-part and multipart uploads, RequiredHeaders for MinIO pre-signed URLs, and manual HTTP login for environments without auto-redirect.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Upload.BannouUploader.IsConnected
member.summary: Gets whether the uploader is connected.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Upload.BannouUploader.Client
member.summary: Gets the underlying BannouClient for advanced operations.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Upload.BannouUploader.UploadAsync(System.String,System.String,System.IProgress{BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Upload.UploadProgress},System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Uploads a bundle file to Bannou Asset Service.
member.param: Optional progress callback for multipart uploads.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Upload.UploaderOptions
member.summary: Configuration options for the Bannou uploader.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Upload.UploaderOptions.ServerUrl
member.summary: Bannou service URL (e.g., "wss://bannou.example.com" or "https://bannou.example.com"). For email/password auth, HTTP(S) URLs are converted to WS(S) for WebSocket connections.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Upload.UploaderOptions.ServiceToken
member.summary: Service token for authentication (preferred for automation).

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Upload.UploaderOptions.UseManualLogin
member.summary: Whether to use manual HTTP login (POST /auth/login) before WebSocket connection. Useful when the server doesn't support auto-redirect or for debugging. Default is false (use BannouClient's built-in auth).

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Upload.UploaderOptions.UploadTimeoutMs
member.summary: HTTP timeout for upload operations in milliseconds. Default is 5 minutes.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Upload.UploaderOptions.VerboseLogging
member.summary: Whether to enable verbose logging for uploads.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Upload.UploadResult
member.summary: Result of uploading a bundle to Bannou.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Upload.UploadResult.BundleId
member.summary: Bundle ID assigned by the service.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Upload.UploadResult.UploadId
member.summary: Upload ID from the upload request.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.AssetBundler.Upload.UploadResult.SizeBytes
member.summary: Size of the uploaded bundle in bytes.
